original_title: 40 Years in the Making: The Magic Music Movie
overview: TV writer/producer Lee Aronsohn tracks down the scattered members of a beloved early 1970's band with the hope that, 40 years after they broke up, he can get them to play one last show.
tagline: They were going to be the next big thing... but shit happened.
title: 40 Years in the Making: The Magic Music Movie
